transcript:
Executive: Haan ji Ashish sir. 
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Sir bataiye. 
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Bataiye. 
Customer: Haan good morning Himanshu baat kar raha hu last week baat hui thi aapse India Mart se. 
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. 
Customer: Ji aapne bola tha aaj call karne ke liye Thursday. 
Executive: Haan haan haan. 
Customer: Ji ji ji. To sir isme do companiya chal chal rahi hai aapki. 
Executive: Sir mera dono ka ek sath me dalwata hu. 
Customer: Ek sath hi renewal hai dono ka hi wo mai dekh raha tha. Wahi mai dekh raha tha. Ek pe aapka number hai ek pe aapka staff ka hai. 
Executive: Mere ko bhejiye na account detail bhejiye na. 
Customer: Kitne saal ka karana hai? 
Executive: Andhra Pradesh me hai ye. Ek saal ka. 
Customer: Dono pe ek ek saal ka? 
Executive: Ye bhi government ka hai. 
Customer: Do saal ka nahi kar sakte? 
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir ek saal ka. 
Customer: Thik hai. 
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Renewal of two companies with India Mart.

- Wants to know for how many years renewal to be done.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share account details.

- Renewal can be done for one year.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

renewal, india mart, account details
